member.name: T:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup
member.summary: Audio group, connected to an AudioMixerGroup

member.name: F:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.maxSources
member.summary: Max AudioSources for this group. DO NOT change this at runtime

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.Play(UnityEngine.AudioClip,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Play the given sound with the given options

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.Stop
member.summary: Stop all sounds for this group

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.Stop(UnityEngine.AudioClip)
member.summary: Stop all sounds for this group that are using the given clip

member.name: T:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioManager
member.summary: Global AudioManager. Must be instantiated only once per project (either manually or via code). Its GameObject is set automatically to DontDestroyOnLoad.

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioManager.Play(DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroupId,UnityEngine.AudioClip,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Play the given sound with the given options and using the given group id. A DeAudioGroup with the given ID must exist in order for the sound to play.

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioManager.Stop(DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroupId)
member.summary: Stops all sounds for the given group

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioManager.Stop(UnityEngine.AudioClip)
member.summary: Stops all sounds for the given clip

member.name: T:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioNotificator
member.summary: Static event notificator for all DeAudio events

member.name: T:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource
member.summary: Data connected to every AudioSource added by DeAudioManager

member.name: F:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.locked
member.summary: If TRUE, the AudioSource won't be recycled until it's unlocked

member.name: P:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.isFree
member.summary: TRUE if the audioSource is not playing and is not locked

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.Play(UnityEngine.AudioClip,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Play the given clip with the given options. Calling Play directly from a DeAudioSource overrides any lock that might've been set (though the locked status will remain active if present)

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.Stop
member.summary: Stops any sound connected to this source

member.name: P:DG.DeAudio.Events.DeAudioEventArgs.audioGroup
member.summary: Eventual involved in the event (can be NULL)

member.name: P:DG.DeAudio.Events.DeAudioEventArgs.source
member.summary: Eventual involved in the event (can be NULL)
